org.j2free.annotations
Annotation Type ServletConfig

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface ServletConfig

Optional Element Summary
 java.lang.String[] mappings
           
 int maxUses
          Overrides the global value of filter.invoker.servlet-max-uses for this servlet only.
 boolean preferDirectLookups
          If true, ServletConfigs that use regex or wildcard mappings will only resolve each possible variation once, after which a direct mapping to the resolved servlet will be stored, enabling O(1) lookups on future requests to the same path.
 java.lang.String regex

mappings

public abstract java.lang.String[] mappings
Returns:
The paths for which this configuration should indicate the endpoint.
Default:
{}

regex

public abstract java.lang.String regex
Returns:
A regex to match against paths.
Default:
""

ssl

public abstract ServletConfig.SSLOption ssl
Returns:
The SSLOption in effect
Default:
org.j2free.annotations.ServletConfig.SSLOption.UNSPECIFIED

requireController

public abstract boolean requireController
Returns:
true if the Servlet requires a Controller, otherwise false.
Default:
true

preferDirectLookups

public abstract boolean preferDirectLookups
If true, ServletConfigs that use regex or wildcard mappings will only resolve each possible variation once, after which a direct mapping to the resolved servlet will be stored, enabling O(1) lookups on future requests to the same path. It is not recommended that Servlets modify this value but, if memory is a concern, it could be disabled for servlets that match to a large number of URLs.

Returns:
true if regex or wildcard mappings that resolve to this endpoint should be cached. Enabling this allows for lookups in O(1) time after the first match but uses more memory.
Default:
true

maxUses

public abstract int maxUses
Overrides the global value of filter.invoker.servlet-max-uses for this servlet only. Useful for disabling servlet reloading for a particular servlet.

Returns:
Indicates how many requests a Servlet instance may serve before it is discarded and a new instance is constructed. -1 indicates that the value is unset and the default, specified by the InvokerFilter config, should be used. To disable reloading of instances of this Servlet, return 0.
Default:
-1
